articles.title: "Australian PM Assured Me That Indian Community's Safety A Priority": PM Modi - NDTV
articles.description: Nearly four temples in Australia have been vandalised in the last two months.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today said that the Australian PM has assured of Indian community's safety after incidents of vandalism of temples.
"I have seen reports of attacks on temples… [+899 chars]
